mapper.select: SELECT lib_id, m_id, m_nick, m_heat FROM ( SELECT lib_id FROM mylib WHERE lib_id = #{lib_id} ) AS AA LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT m_id, m_nick, m_heat FROM member ) AS BB ON AA.lib_id = BB.m_id UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT lib_id FROM mylib ) AS AA RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT m_id, m_nick, m_heat FROM member WHERE m_id = #{lib_id} ) AS BB ON AA.lib_id = BB.m_id

SELECT lib_no, b_code, b_bookcover, b_name, lib_proc FROM ( SELECT lib_no, lib_bcode, lib_proc FROM mylib WHERE lib_id = #{lib_id} ) AA LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT b_code, b_bookcover, b_name FROM book ) BB ON AA.lib_bcode = BB.b_code ORDER BY lib_no DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT c_code, c_name, c_id, c_state, ac_ccode, ac_manjok, ac_review, ac_id FROM ( SELECT c_code, c_name, c_id, c_state FROM community WHERE c_id = #{lib_id} ) AA LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ac_ccode, ac_manjok, ac_review, ac_id FROM community_ac ) BB ON AA.c_id = BB.ac_id UNION SELECT c_code, c_name, c_id, c_state, ac_ccode, ac_manjok, ac_review, ac_id FROM ( SELECT c_code, c_name, c_id, c_state FROM community ) AA RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ac_ccode, ac_manjok, ac_review, ac_id FROM community_ac WHERE ac_id = #{lib_id} ) BB ON AA.c_id = BB.ac_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookreview(br_bcode, br_id, br_title, br_content, br_star) VALUES(#{br_bcode}, #{br_id}, #{br_title}, #{br_content}, #{br_star});
